education.position_title: MSc. Electrical Engineering spec. Automation and Robot Technology
education.description: Master Thesis:\ 'Design and implementation of a low-power energy storage wake-up circuit for a one-dimensional energy harvester based on magnetic induction' - included programming ESP32 microcontrollers and Bluetooth Low Power (BLE) modules for communication.\\ Courses Taken::\ Real-Time Systems, Linear Control Design, Advanced autonomous robots, \Digital control, Deep learning in computer vision, \Image analysis with microcomputer
Courses Taken: \Comparative Programming Languages, Java, R, e-Security, Computer-Aided IC Design

Bachelor Thesis:\ 'Implementation of algorithm for automatically generating parameters for type-2 fuzzy logic controllers in MATLAB toolbox'\\ Courses Taken:\ Control Engineering, C++, Microprocessor Technology, Real-Time Systems, Fundamentals of Machine Design, \Engineering Drawing, Computer Networks and Databases
